channel.title: DevilsScape V2
channel.description:
Client: [url=http://devilsscape.com/client.jar]http://devilsscape.com/client.jar[/url] Webclient: [url=http://devilsscape.com/webclient.php]http://devilsscape.com/webclient.php[/url] Home: [url=http://devilsscape.com/portal.php]http://devilsscape.com/portal.php[/url] Forums: [url=http://devilsscape.com/forum]http://devilsscape.com/forum[/url]
Features: 24/7 Nex VPS Hosted Dedicated Owner No Lag All 25 Skills Working Custom Bosses Mini Boss pets Custom Items Prestige Skill Bandos Torva Virtus Pernix ::yellzone (to get yells) ::loyaltyzone (to get awesome cool custom player titles) ::petzone (to get awesome mini boss pets and tz-rek jad) ::warriorzone (to get Bandos armor, torso, etc.) Correct Dungeoneering - 120/120 Zombies Minigame ::minigame (to get pvp armor and Dice bag) Dicing Gambler NPC (That's right, an NPC that rolls the dice for your pot!) A lot of Custom Quests (Donator and non-Donator) Awesome Forums Dedicated Staff Active and great community MONEY POUCH - THAT'S RIGHT, THE ONLY 562 WITH MONEY POUCH. NPC GFX Correctly working All Dupes patched Amazing bosses! Corp Jad Giant Jad Giant Nex Mini nex Giant glod Giant nomad Wildy Wyrm 100% perfected combat
Time for pics! (and yes, i am the owner of this server)
Custom Client: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/CustomClient.jpg[/img]
Mini Boss pets(Mini nex :D also, the dude in the golden mining is an npc too :P): [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/MiniNex.jpg[/img]
Random pic of Nex: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/Nex.jpg[/img]
Prestige System: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/Prestiging.jpg[/img]
PM System(Real private messaging works too but this is an alternative): [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/CustomPMINGSystem.jpg[/img]
More of PM System: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/PMSystem.jpg[/img]
HD and fullscreen fully working: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/HDandfullscreen.jpg[/img]
x10 Hits option when client is started up.: [IMG]http://i568.photobucket.com/albums/ss122/beastmode904/x10hitsoption.jpg[/img]
That's all for now, i'll be adding more pics later, Hope you guys enjoy this server!!!

item.title: DevilsScape V2

item.description:

looks like my first made LEGO shit.
but good luck. add some more colored txts.

Read full topic

MONEY POUCH - THAT’S RIGHT, THE ONLY 562 WITH MONEY POUCH.

All Dupes patched
Amazing bosses!

Wildy Wyrm
100% perfected combat
